analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Python in 2014, working on various projects including a Google Protobuf Decoder and a Redis Python Client. In 2020, moved to Go and created a deprecated project called zgrab. Recently worked on Burp Suite plugins, including Param Miner and ActiveScan++. Also experimented with Java for Bambdas collection.

match_profile.similar_user_traits: Active contributor to open-source projects, particularly in the Burp Suite ecosystem.
conversation_starters: What inspired you to work on Param Miner?
How do you approach debugging complex issues in your plugins?
Can you share any recent security findings from your research?
